localString.value: Welcome to the Gambletron-2000 Slot Machine!
Certainly. What do you need to know?

There are five symbols, Lemon, Cherry, Orange, Liberty Bell, and the Lucky 7. Winning combinations, and their payout are as follows:
Two Lemons: 1x bet Three Lemons: 2x bet Two Cherries: 2x bet Two Oranges: 4x bet Three Cherries: 5x bet Fruit Basket (1 of each fruit): 5x bet Two Liberty Bells: 8x bet Two Lucky 7's: 10x bet Three Oranges: 10x bet Three Liberty Bells: 20x bet! 2 Liberty Bells and 1 Lucky 7: 25x bet! Three Lucky 7's: 100x bet!!
Simply select the amount you wish to bet on each spin of the wheels (up to 100GP on this machine) and the results will be displayed.
Please select the amount you wish to wager.
Please select the amount you wish to wager.
No thanks, I like my GP right where it is now...
May I see the rules please?
I changed my mind, I do not wish to play.
Nevermind, I'm ready to play now.
Oh. Well then I'm not going to play.
How do I play this game?
How do I play this game?
I changed my mind. Thanks anyway!
Oh, er, um... Wait, I need to review the rules.
Oh, er, um... Wait, I need to review the rules.
